article_title: Entire Gaza population facing acute hunger - US
sentence: Asked  about  the  numbers  of  journalists  killed  in  Gaza  and  lack  of  access  to  the  territory  for  international  reporters,  Mr  Blinken  said  that  "as  a  matter  of  principle"  journalists  should  have  access  wherever  there  is  conflict  so  "the  world  can  have  knowledge".
